product_name: Big Agnes Fly Creek 1 Platinum Tent
long_description: The insanely light, 3-season Big Agnes Fly Creek 1 Platinum Tent weighs in at a scant 1 lb. 6 oz.; fully enclosed mesh walls offer bug protection, ventilation and views for your solo adventures.
short_description: The insanely light, 3-season Big Agnes Fly Creek 1 Platinum Tent weighs in at a scant 1 lb. 6 oz.; fully enclosed mesh walls offer bug protection, ventilation and views for your solo adventures.
